sentences.sContent: And if you came up with more than one, you’re probably either a former presidential speechwriter or a historian.

sentences.sContent: Tommy Vietor, a National Security Council spokesman, and the speechwriter Jon Favreau are competitive, and Mr. McClellan sometimes pits them against Sam Kass, a young White House chef.
